metadata.title: CVE-2022-48639 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:sched: fix possible refcount leak in tc_new_tfilter() tfilter_put need tobe called to put the refount got by tp->ops->get to avoid possible refcountleak when chain->tmplt_ops != NULL and chain->tmplt_ops != tp->ops.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
